org.nd4j.linalg.learning

Interface GradientUpdaterAggregator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaDelta.AdaDeltaAggregator, AdaGrad.AdaGradAggregator, Adam.AdamAggregator, Nesterovs.NesterovsAggregator, RmsProp.RmsPropAggregator, Sgd.SgdAggregator

    public interface GradientUpdaterAggregator
extends java.io.Serializable
    The GradientUpdaterAggregator is used (typically in distributed learning scenarios) to combine separate GradientUpdater instances for different networks (usually by averaging). Typically, this is done by averaging the states of the GradientUpdater instances, however this need not be the case in general.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add/aggregate a GradientUpdater with this GradientUpdaterAggregator.
      GradientUpdaterAggregator combine(GradientUpdaterAggregator other)
      Combine this GradientUpdaterAggregator with another GradientUpdaterAggregator.
      GradientUpdater getUpdater()
      Get the final updater after aggregation
